subject: Simsonn HS Pro
description_text:
Order # SSN5306

Hello. I just received my HS Pro Shifter!  I'm excited to use it, but found
that 7th and Reverse are swapped. The calibration does not allow me to
change. What should I do?

Thanks

Travis Crowder

conversations.body_text: Hi Travis Crowder,  Please first uninstall SIMSONN Manager from your computer. Then download and install the official SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 EXE version from our website (please make sure to download it from the official site). After installation, open the software and recalibrate the 7R mode. The issue should be resolved.Â
